name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Scroll: Effortless Page Navigation Chrome Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance browsing by automating page scrolling. Customizable speeds & loop options. Streamline content consumption effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Scroll is a convenient Chrome extension designed to enhance the browsing experience by automating page scrolling. By using this plugin, users can effortlessly navigate through web pages without the need for manual scrolling. Auto Scroll offers customizable scrolling speeds and options to loop the scrolling behavior, providing flexibility to cater to individual preferences. Whether for reading lengthy articles, browsing image galleries, or navigating through long webpages, Auto Scroll streamlines the process by automating scrolling, allowing users to focus on content consumption without the hassle of constant manual scrolling
